trans-unit.target: TEXT_STMBDZ813_02841_SEQ_00<tab>This well-meaning mother has spread herself a little too thin.
TEXT_STMBDZ813_02841_TODO_00<tab>Express /doubt as to what the children have been up to.
TEXT_STMBDZ813_02841_TODO_01<tab>Speak with the well-meaning mother.
TEXT_STMBDZ813_02841_WORRYMOTHER02841_000_000<tab>I swear, where did those boys run off to this time?
TEXT_STMBDZ813_02841_WORRYMOTHER02841_000_001<tab>Excuse me, <var 08 E905 ((miss)) ((sir)) /var>. I've searched everywhere and I can't find my boys. Would you help me look for them?

TEXT_STMBDZ813_02841_WORRYMOTHER02841_000_002<tab>Work has kept me so busy I haven't been able to spend any time with them. Even when I do have a few moments to spare, they're always gone doing gods know what.

TEXT_STMBDZ813_02841_WORRYMOTHER02841_000_003<tab>If you find them and they start making excuses, you'd be wise to <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>doubt<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> them. Still, they've never been the sort to get into trouble. <sigh> I hope they're okay.

TEXT_STMBDZ813_02841_WORRYMOTHER02841_000_009<tab>They're sure to make up excuses to avoid getting in trouble, but I know my boys. If you show any <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>doubt<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> of their stories, they'll tell the truth.
TEXT_STMBDZ813_02841_JOVIALBOY02841_000_010<tab>Wh-What? Mother sent you to check on me? I haven't done anything bad, I promise.

TEXT_STMBDZ813_02841_JOVIALBOY02841_000_011<tab>I've been studying the plants and bugs out here. Someday I'm going to be a scholar, and make lots of money so Mother doesn't have to work so hard all the time.
TEXT_STMBDZ813_02841_JOVIALBOY02841_000_012<tab>I never meant to make her worry. I better go home and let her know I'm okay.
TEXT_STMBDZ813_02841_JOVIALBOY02841_000_013<tab>...I've never seen wings like this on a bug before. I wonder why they're so different?
TEXT_STMBDZ813_02841_LIVELYBOY02841_000_020<tab>Mother sent you? She's always making a fuss over nothing.
TEXT_STMBDZ813_02841_LIVELYBOY02841_000_021<tab>I was just training is all. I'm going to join the Resistance, and defeat all the Garleans. Then she won't have to worry about anything ever again.
TEXT_STMBDZ813_02841_LIVELYBOY02841_000_022<tab>I wanted to practice a bit more before I told her, but I don't want her getting worked up over nothing. I should be heading back before she gets mad.
TEXT_STMBDZ813_02841_LIVELYBOY02841_000_023<tab>What do you want? Can't you see I'm busy practicing?
TEXT_STMBDZ813_02841_WORRYMOTHER02841_000_030<tab>The boys are home, safe and sound. I don't know what you told them, but they certainly had a lot on their minds when they walked through the door.

TEXT_STMBDZ813_02841_WORRYMOTHER02841_000_031<tab>They grow up so fast... I usually only ever see them when they're sleeping, but I looked into their eyes today and saw a fire that wasn't there before.
TEXT_STMBDZ813_02841_WORRYMOTHER02841_000_032<tab>They've never known their father, but no matter how bad things got, I did everything I could to give them a happy childhood.

TEXT_STMBDZ813_02841_WORRYMOTHER02841_000_033<tab>We'll be alright, you wait and see. I may look battered and beaten, but we mothers are made of sterner stuff. Our love for our children is the greatest strength there is.
